content: this basketweave dish drying mat is simple and functional it provides a soft cushy place for dished to dry the woven texture will even keep dishes elevated so that air can circulate around them the pattern is a great project for a beginner that feels comfortable with double_crochet using the gauge of 12 sts to 4 this project can be completed with approximately 360 yards of worsted weight cotton yarn the finished item is 15 5 by 18 if your gauge varies your project will be larger or smaller accordingly there were some problems with attaching the pdf for the pattern i think it is fixed now yay crochet away
